channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Recipe Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Recipe Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34792|2024-08-03T09:22:10.237Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20recipe%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Recipe Plugin 1.2 and earlier allows attackers to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML.

item.title: CVE-2022-34793|2024-08-03T09:22:09.994Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20recipe%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Recipe Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-34794|2024-08-03T09:22:10.506Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20recipe%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Recipe Plugin 1.2 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML.
